ygData.subject: Re: Just another newb
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome to the game. You are already way ahead having someone in your life also sharing your virtual life. In that way you can play without neglecting someone,
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to the game. You are already way ahead having someone in your
life also sharing your virtual life. In that way you can play without
neglecting someone, but infact bond with them in a very special way.

Sadly, I am on the Zeb server, so our hails will have to be here.
This is a good list, and much fellowship and advice shall be found
here. It is a little slow here right now, but has it's busy periods.

I am a halfling druid as my primary. Lvl 30. I am also a halfling
warrior, lvl 8, and a gnome magician, lvl 3. I have worked my primary
most of the time, but now am attending a bit more to my alts.

Feel free to ask questions here. This is a great place to share
adventures, get advice, and share what you have learned.

Barto Proudfoot
Halfling Druid
Zeb server

--- In EverQuest@y..., "masterkiis_nara" <masterkiis_nara@y...> wrote:
> I am really new at the game (have been playing only about a
> month)...i am on the Ayonae Ro server with a couple of characters
> (lvl 9 Barb Warrior and lvl 5 Cleric...told you I was new...LOL)
Was
> just curious if anyone else in on that server...usually am hunting
> with the love of my life who is teaching me the game but would be
fun
> to pass a friendly "Hail" to those here on the list should our
paths
> cross...would that be proper and acceptable EQ etiquette?? Just
> curious :-)
>
> Naara
